javax.websocket.DecodeException

  • 使用DecodeException的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    javax.websocket  
    org.apache.tomcat.websocket.pojo
    This package provides the necessary plumbing to convert an annotated POJO into a WebSocket Endpoint.
